properties.Observatio: This 200m long canal exists as a earthen canal. 3 Acres of paddy is cultivated from this canal.
properties.Descriptio:
Vegetative cover improving for narrow strips (1.5m-2.0m wide) with Arecanut seedlings at 1.5m spacing in 2 rows, Betel plants VP at 3m spacing in 1 row, Green gram as a cover crop
